articles.title: Meta Llama: Everything you need to know about the open generative AI model - TechCrunch
articles.description: Meta's Llama models are open generative AI models designed to run on a range of hardware and perform a range of different tasks.
articles.content: Like every big tech company these days, Meta has its own flagship generative AI model, called Llama. Llama is somewhat unique among major models in that it’s “open,” meaning developers can download a… [+6679 chars]

articles.description: Apple's Glowtime iPhone event will include the iPhone 16, but may also feature new AirPods, a new Apple Watch and possibly even new Macs.
